import React,{useContext} from 'react' import "./Textinput.css" import {Data} from "../../context/Userdata" export default function Textinput() { const b = useContext(Data) let prp = b.githublink let setprp = b.setgithublink if(b.linkpointer===1){ prp = b.telegramlink setprp = b.settelegramlink } return (
{setprp(e.target.value)}}/>

It is optional to fill the links If you don't fill it then
it will not displayed on your original porfolio

) }
